title: Preparation method of starch-base biodegradation material
assignees: Chengdu New Keli Chemical Science Co Ltd

events.title: Application filed by Chengdu New Keli Chemical Science Co Ltd
events.assignee_search: Chengdu New Keli Chemical Science Co Ltd

abstract: The invention provides a preparation method of a starch-base biodegradation material. The starch-base biodegradation material is characterized by comprising the following raw materials in parts by weight: 70-85 parts of starch, 0.05-0.5 part of amylase, 1-11 parts of acetylating agent, 4-11 parts of plasticiser, 3-6 parts of hydrophobic modifier and 5-20 parts of biomass polymer. The preparation method comprises the following step of: (1) adding water into the starch, and adding amylase, and stirring for gelatinization; (2) adding the acetylating agent into the product in step (1), and stirring for reaction; (3) adding the plasticiser into the product in step (2), and to continuously stirring; (4) adding the hydrophobic modifier into the product in step (3), and continuously stirring to obtain starch gel; (5) adding the biomass polymer into the starch gel in the step (4), uniformly mixing, and delivering the uniform mixture into a twin-screw extruder to extrude and granulate. The invention has the advantages of simple operation, stable technology, low cost and high efficiency, and the obtained product has the advantage of good film forming property, mechanical property, water resistance property and degradation property.
claims: 2. the preparation method of starch-base biodegradation material according to claim 1 is characterized in that starch is a kind of in W-Gum, tapioca (flour), yam starch, pea starch, sweet potato starch or the wheat starch; Amylase is α-Dian Fenmei; Acetylating agent is a kind of in diacetyl oxide, acetate, the vinyl acetate; Softening agent is one or both in ethylene glycol, glycerine, polyoxyethylene glycol, propylene glycol, the sorbyl alcohol; A kind of in stearic acid, oxidized polyethlene wax, white oil, vegetables oil, mineral oil, titanate coupling agent, the aluminate coupling agent selected in the hydrophobically modified agent for use; The biomass polymkeric substance is a kind of in poly--butyric ester (PHB), poly--hydroxyl valerate (PHBV), poly-succinic-butanediol ester (PBS), poly-own lactones (PCL), the poly(lactic acid) (PLA).
